text: "Berzerk" is a 2013 song by American rapper Eminem and is the lead single from his 8th studio album The Marshall Mathers LP 2. It went to number 2 in Canada and the United Kingdom, number 3 in Scotland and the United States, number 5 in Australia, number 9 in Switzerland, number 10 in France and Germany, number 12 in New Zealand and number 13 in Denmark. == References == Category:2013 songs Category:Eminem songs
title: Berzerk (song)
